content: foot holding the yarn double using the long tail work in stockinette until you ve reached cast on or preferred method co 32 36 3 25 / shorted than your foot length 40 44 48 52 stitches join for working in the round be careful not to twist your work fading you will now be fading in your cc you will be dividing the stitches evenly round 1 holding your cc double knit 1 between your two needles 16 18 20 22 round 24 26 stitches on each needle round 2 holding your mc double knit 1 round rounds 1-15 *k2 p2 repeat from * repeat rounds 1-2 for a total of 6 rounds leg cut your mc round 3 holding your cc double knit 1 work in stockinette knitting every round round until you ve reached 3 5 4 6 6 6 6 / 9 repeat round 3 until you ve reached 0 75 1 10 15 15 15 15 cm or the desired length 1 25 1 5 inches / 2 2 5 3 4 cm shorter from your cast on edge the sample was than your foot length knit to 6 inches/ 15 cm from the ribbing for the size adult small toe note my preferred length of leg is between 5 5 to 7 inches / 13 9 to 17 7 cm before starting the heel you can make round 1 k1 ssk knit to the last 3 your sock leg as long or as short as you d stitches k2tog k1 repeat on both like needles round 2 knit heel continue working rounds 1 and 2 until you have 10 10 12 12 14 14 stitches left on each needle graft together using kitchener follow instructions on page 6 stitch and weave in all ends ©twinstitchesdesigns 2024 all rights reserved toe-up heel cast on follow instructions on page 6 using the turkish cast on or preferred method co with your cc 16 20 24 24 leg 24 28 stitches 8 10 12 12 12 14 stitches each on the top and bottom work in stockinette knitting every round until you ve reached 1 5 / 4 cm shorter toe than your total desired leg length the sample was knit to 6 inches/ 15 cm round 1 knit all stitches including ribbing for the size adult small round 2 *k1 kfb knit to the last two stitches on the needle kfb k1 repeat from * on the second needle cuff repeat these two rounds until you ve reached 32 36 40 44 48 52 total rounds 1-15 *k2 p2 repeat from * around stitches 16 18 20 22 24 28 stitches each on the top and bottom needles bind off foot knit in stockientte until the sock measures 3 25 / 8 5 cm from the start of the toe fading you will now be fading in your mc round 1 holding your mc double knit 1 round round 2 holding your cc double knit 1
